text: Mansour Al-Soraihi (born June 15, 1971) is a Yemeni judoka who competed for Yemen at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==Career== Al-Soraihi competed in the half- lightweight class at the 1992 Summer Olympics, he was drawn against Sandeep Byala from India in the second round after receiving a bye in the first round, but he lost so didn't advance any further. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Yemeni male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Yemen Category:Judoka at the 1992 Summer Olympics
title: Mansour Al-Soraihi
